title: Becoming Aware
description: Tormented at school for being overweight, Abriya can't wait to get the hell out of there. To top it all off, her crush, Clarence James, seems completely out of reach - until he unexpectedly kisses her after an Arts lesson.Something changes after their kiss and Clarence avoids her afterwards, but as the exams finish and school is finally done, they find themselves alone together again. Abriya is special, Clarence tells her as much and although he has to leave her for a couple of years, he soon returns to help her through her change.However, she soon discovers that changing was the easy part, it's what comes after that hurts.
author: A.T. Ebanks
